item.title: More Details on the new Acer Chromebook 15 Models
item.description: This interview from Lon Seidman with an Acer representative provides some more detail on the upcoming Acer Chromebook 15, that is being showcased at CES 2015.

item.title: Linux Experts on Linux, Netbooks and the Future
item.description: Arnaud Laprévote, CTO & Head of Research Projects at Mandriva, and Aaron J. Seigo, KDE developer and KDE Foundation member, are interviewed by Charbax.
